TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TVAttribute extends ObjCRuntime.IntroducedAttribute

Docs.summary: Attribute indicating when an API was first introduced in tvOS.
Docs.remarks: This class is a shortcut to create an AvailabilityAttribute instance.
